title: The Fate of Kassadin's Daughter Chapter 1

embed.description: (Still need a name for Kassadin's Daughter suggestions welcomed) Kassadin's daughter lost, alone and afraid making her way down to the Fungus forest a sight that became even more beautiful the closer she came to the purple glow, she noticed the small moon on the drift away behind the horizon, her n

body:
(Ok so a friend gave me the name of Kassadin's Daughter her name is now Katy)

Setting off to the Fungus forest Katy now having a steel resolve to return too her world to be able to see the father she loves. Katy still holding doubt behind the voice that reached out too in her dreams, Kassadin warned her that the creatures of the void were cunning and would twist humans to fit their means and discard them like scrap. reaching the edge of the forest it felt like the edge of the howling abyss she heard from her father about that he gets forced to play on during his calling to the league, her heart pounding in her ears, her knees trembling in fear she had entered this forest yesterday in fear, retreating from the xer'sai that she laid eyes upon and chased her. taking her first step into the forest her slender figure contrasting on the fungus foliage the thick and fat each emitting a different shade of purple. Brushing past the foliage the only sound was Katy traversing through the forest the pressing of her shoes on loose dirt, dying plant matter, the brushing of clothing on the foliage that got in her way and her breathing as she grew exhausted while the foliage that continued to thicken with each step. Finally from the unknown distance Katy traversed her legs gave out sitting on the ground laying on the she gazed into the sky she saw the small moon almost looking back at her she reached out her hand as if trying to grasp the moon with her slender fingers closing her hand into her fist then letting her hand fall down to her side deciding to now sit up brushing the dirt out of her long black hair, stretching out her stiff limbs from the long walk, grabbing out some military rations she tore at them like an animal the taste was horrid but Katy was so hungry that she didn't care it satisfied her hunger. Rising once again she set off disappearing into the foliage unknowing of the creature that she failed to notice followed her seeking a meal that would sate it's hunger.

(Ok so this is a short chapter i will do a longer one tomorrow any advice or criticism is welcomed so I can improve the quality of this story)
